title: Deavmi Archive Network
description:
Welcome to the Deavmi Archive Network! Also known as the DAN.

This site is an archive of all pf the projects (programs and documents) that Deavmi has created or is in the process of creating.

The DAN also includes links to projects (as in sites) that Deavmi is currently running.

All content is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International.
links:
###Sites

- [Personal homepage](https://deavmi.github.io)
- [Blog](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9)

###Projects in the physical world

- [FreedomCrate project](/1KdZx5chU5scTr5sHy4gkwVmVmJC99rzjD)

###Notable posts

####_Great things_

- [My own Lips dialect proposal](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:34:My+own+Lisp+dialect+proposal)
- [Bash page hit counter](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:32:Bash+Page+Hit+Counter+for+CGI)
- [Mark programming language proposal](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:26:Mark+Programming+Language+proposal)
- [RaspberryPi Professional Setup Script](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:24:RaspberryPi+Professional+Setup+Script)
- [The Freedom Box Project](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:23:The+Freedom+Box+-+Offline,+anonymous+file+sharing.)
- [Silex - A web browser that runs on the ZeroNet stack](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:9:Silex+-+A+web+browser+that+runs+on+the+ZeroNet+stack)

####_Needs crypto-analysis_

- [Encryption protocol with character map](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Home)

####_Other not-so-great things (don't use em')_

- [Blueberry encryption algorithmn](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:33:Blueberry+encryption+protocol)
- [A new encryption protocol](/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:30:A+new+Encryption+Protocol+-+Scrapped+idea)

###Social Media

- [GNU Social](https://quitter.se/deavmi)
- [Pjuu](https://pjuu.com/deavmi)
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/deavmi)

###Projects and Papers

A list of all my project and papers that I have programed and written can be found on the [Deavmi Archive Network (**DAN**)](/183hZtmtXXB3vxZTn3WYbjVWtAsoVEtRXN).

###Things I host

- [**Programming.Net**](http://bit.no.com:43110/17YUF4geTD7gBDPeMtQtnV7uhhNcjrYi9u/?Topic:1_1JdoX9KdJeRVjN9zvK8N9C5jybEHzZe8n/Welcome+to+Programming+Net) - _A programming forum for everyone._

###Donate

post.title: Welcome to the Deavmi Archive Network!
post.body:
##What is the DAN?

Welcome to the Deavmi Archive Network! This is the offical archive for all of [Deavmi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Home)'s programs he has written (computer programs) and also all the documentations he has written (specifications for several of his future projects).

##Archive Contents

This section contains all the entries into the network.

###Programs

1. **libtype**
	* A data type helping library for the primitive data types in Python for those who need a beautiful looking way of getting the data type of a specific value.

###Papers
####Access with proxy (with *)

1. **Malio Programming Languages**
    * Source Code:https://notabug.org/org/Malio
    * Description: Malio is a small built-ins orientated programming language with an interpreter implemented in Bash. It is a procedural paradigm programming language.

2. **Felix Programming Languages**
    * Source Code:https://notabug.org/org/Felix
    * Description: Felix is a small built-ins orientated programming language with an interpreter implemented in Fortran. It is a procedural paradigm programming language.

3. **Silex web browser***
    * Source Code: http://bit.no.com:43110/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:9:Silex+-+A+web+browser+that+runs+on+the+ZeroNet+stack
    * Description: A text-based, own-specification based and Python-based web browser that operates on the ZeroNet stack.

4. **Spiral social network***
    * Source Code: http://bit.no.com:43110/17pTf9tzLGxVQnRKGhg1M85DCXJ7YXPdv9/?Post:21:Spiral+-+A+small+micro-blogging-like+social+network+for+Zeronet
    * Description: A text-based social network written in Python which operates on the ZeroNet stack.

###Hosted Sites
####Access via proxy

- [**Programming.Net**](http://bit.no.com:43110/17YUF4geTD7gBDPeMtQtnV7uhhNcjrYi9u/?Topic:1_1JdoX9KdJeRVjN9zvK8N9C5jybEHzZe8n/Welcome+to+Programming+Net) - _A programming forum for everyone._

- [**Dev.Net**]() - _The developers social network._

- [**iOS.Net**](http://bit.no.com:43110/1P6WFojtuCiDkwbFj9ZnrvqwdcCT7xFK45) - _iOS Forum_
